record.id: field.name="kbfieldvalue" and file.name="kmknowledgebase" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: kbfieldvalue
record.file.name: kmknowledgebase

brief.brief: The alias field is name of the field the indexer will store the data in.

detail.detail: The alias field can show up in the hit list, depending on your settings. You may index one to many fields from a single Service Manager table into a single alias. You can also use this feature to index different fields from different Service Manager tables into a common field, making searching easier.
